mapper.sql: `id`, `project_name` AS `projectName`, `filling_time` AS `fillingTime`, `administrative_area` AS `administrativeArea`, `competent_department` AS `competentDepartment`, `project_location` AS `projectLocation`, `construction_company` AS `constructionCompany`, `construction_company_social_credit_certificate_number` AS `constructionCompanySocialCreditCertificateNumber`, `winning_company` AS `winningCompany`, `winning_company_social_credit_certificate_number` AS `winningCompanySocialCreditCertificateNumber`, `winning_time` AS `winningTime`, `winning_money` AS `winningMoney`, `begin_time` AS `beginTime`, `create_time` AS `createTime`, `creator`, `update_time` AS `updateTime`, `updater`, `data_location` AS `dataLocation`
